annotation.spannedText: their children have suffered a severe reaction to vaccines and been left with severe disabilities or have died

annotation.spannedText: parents

classMention.mentionClass: parents

annotation.spannedText: Please help parents to have a choice by signing the e-petition

classMention.mentionClass: Please help parents to have a choice by signing the e-petition

annotation.spannedText: Let us send a strong message to the Government that choice is the way to go not compulsion

classMention.mentionClass: Let us send a strong message to the Government that choice is the way to go not compulsion

annotation.spannedText: forward the e-petition link to anyone you feel might support this issue via email or any social networks you may be active on

classMention.mentionClass: forward the e-petition link to anyone you feel might support this issue via email or any social networks you may be active on

annotation.spannedText: the MMR vaccine should be suspended and parents should have a right under the NHS system to request the single component vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: the MMR vaccine should be suspended and parents should have a right under the NHS system to request the single component vaccines

annotation.spannedText: Parents need to be aware when considering single dose vaccines for measles, mumps and rubella that Merck and Co USA, the manufacturers of Mumpsvax (Jeryl Lynn strain) announced in January 2010 that it would no longer provide mumps vaccines as single doses

classMention.mentionClass: Parents need to be aware when considering single dose vaccines for measles, mumps and rubella that Merck and Co USA, the manufacturers of Mumpsvax (Jeryl Lynn strain) announced in January 2010 that it would no longer provide mumps vaccines as single doses

annotation.spannedText: ensure you have accurate information on the potential side effects and also accurate information about the diseases when making your decision

classMention.mentionClass: ensure you have accurate information on the potential side effects and also accurate information about the diseases when making your decision

annotation.spannedText: Parents need to be aware that single dose vaccines also carry a risk of side effects

classMention.mentionClass: Parents need to be aware that single dose vaccines also carry a risk of side effects

annotation.spannedText: live vaccines should not be given to anyone with a compromised immune system and gives a specific warning if there is a family or personal history of neurological problems or if the child has had a seizure of any kind

classMention.mentionClass: live vaccines should not be given to anyone with a compromised immune system and gives a specific warning if there is a family or personal history of neurological problems or if the child has had a seizure of any kind

classMention.mentionClass: Some of the families registered with JABS

annotation.spannedText: their children were damaged from a single measles vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: their children were damaged from a single measles vaccine

annotation.spannedText: there were contraindications to the vaccine that the vaccinating GP had not identified

classMention.mentionClass: there were contraindications to the vaccine that the vaccinating GP had not identified

annotation.spannedText: Parents should contact their GP who, if he/she agrees, can issue a prescription on a named patient basis and provide medical advice relevant to each individual child

classMention.mentionClass: Parents should contact their GP who, if he/she agrees, can issue a prescription on a named patient basis and provide medical advice relevant to each individual child

annotation.spannedText: If the GP or other health professional has trouble in sourcing a single dose vaccine please ask them to contact JABS

classMention.mentionClass: If the GP or other health professional has trouble in sourcing a single dose vaccine please ask them to contact JABS

annotation.spannedText: if a child has inherited a sensitive immune system then he/she may not cope as well with a vaccine virus

classMention.mentionClass: if a child has inherited a sensitive immune system then he/she may not cope as well with a vaccine virus

annotation.spannedText: it is better to offer something rather than nothing

classMention.mentionClass: it is better to offer something rather than nothing

annotation.spannedText: Please ensure that you ask the doctor/practitioner all relevant questions regarding the vaccines offered

classMention.mentionClass: Please ensure that you ask the doctor/practitioner all relevant questions regarding the vaccines offered

annotation.spannedText: many children will continue to be damaged by combination and single dose vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: many children will continue to be damaged by combination and single dose vaccines

annotation.spannedText: it is for the parent(s) to take full responsibility for vaccine decisions which involves some degree of research before making an informed consent or refusal

classMention.mentionClass: it is for the parent(s) to take full responsibility for vaccine decisions which involves some degree of research before making an informed consent or refusal

annotation.spannedText: Parents should appraise themselves of the registration status of the following doctors and clinics with the Care Quality Commission
